titles.title: Corrective Action Report Oversight and Accountability Act
Corrective Action Report Oversight and Accountability Act
Corrective Action Report Oversight and Accountability Act
To amend the Small Business Act to standardize reporting on procurement goals for small business concerns, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 26 - 0.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Reported by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 118-176.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 140.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
